author: cnbc.com
title: ChromaDex reports 4Q loss
text:
IRVINE, Calif. (AP) _ ChromaDex Inc. (CDXC) on Thursday reported a loss of $8.8 million in its fourth quarter.
The Irvine, California-based company said it had a loss of 17 cents per share.
The natural products company posted revenue of $7.5 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss widened to $11.4 million, or 26 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $21.2 million.
ChromaDex shares have declined 11 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $5.26, a climb of 95 percent in the last 12 months.
